segments.text: My attention is drawn to the other side of the kitchen now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is attempting a daring raid on the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's standing on a two-step stool, reaching up into the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool itself looks incredibly unstable; its legs are splayed outwards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's tilting backward, and I can almost see it wobbling from here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His hands are busy; one is in the cookie jar, pulling out treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The other hand is holding a plate, perhaps to catch his illicit spoils.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is right there beside him, looking up with anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has her palm open, clearly expecting her share of the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This little covert operation is happening right behind the oblivious woman.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm just waiting for the stool to finally give way and send him tumbling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could really hurt himself, or worse, break the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a wonder he hasn't lost his balance already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sheer determination on their faces is quite something, though.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get at least one cookie before the inevitable crash.
segments.speaker: PAR
